item.title: Baked Parmesan Zucchini
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 4 zucchini, quartered lengthwise 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan Italian Seasoning garlic powder salt and pepper, to taste 2 tablespoons olive oil INSTRUCTIONS: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a small bowl, combine Parmesan, Italian Seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, to taste. Place zucchini onto baking sheet and/or grated. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with Parmesan mixture. Place into oven and bake until tender, about 15 minutes.
